column5: have plans for our anual Lake erie trip around the islands of the western basin the last week of may and the first week of june. (Special attention Wopper) have spent several hours over the winter making a few dozen of the reliable harnesses we use . If anybody plans on being in the area around then or before let me know.
Last weekend in May is kind of doubtful, I'll be licking my wounds from a trip in NWO but the first weekend in June is a very good possibility. Hope to see ya then.
